resources.string: " - Age: 24 - Student accountant at Oxford University - Worked at Google inc. - Founder of MyDeli LTD - Read my CV "
"I founded my Deli ltd in 2014 while studying accountancy at University and..."

If this is your first time using SageUp then you need to create an account using the "create account" button.

In the "create account" screen, you can link your SageUp account with your Sage 50 serial number to personalise your experience.

You will have the opportunity to update your sector, sub sector and your turnover after you have created your account.
